name: No Bones Inc.
description:
**NOTE: It is HIGHLY encouraged to download the game with one of the below builds for Windows / Mac / Linux. Performance is much better and there are more objects to play with!**

=========================

CONTROLS

ESCAPE - MENU

LEFT MOUSE CLICK- move him around

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK (while holding) - throw him

SCROLL WHILE HOLDING - move him closer/farther

TAB - close/open the objective sidebar

Note: If your player gets stuck, press escape and click restart!

=========================

Credits:

Programming - aptos, Plexi

3D Art - StrongTea

Music - alexihill
